question: If <katex>$\text{N}_2$</katex> gas is bubbled through water at 293 K, how many moles of <katex>$\text{N}_2$</katex> gas would dissolve in 1 litre of water? Assume that <katex>$\text{N}_2$</katex> exerts a partial pressure of 0.987 bar. [Given <katex>$K_H$</katex> for <katex>$\text{N}_2$</katex> at 293 K is 76.48 kbar]
